name: Taylor Dozier
text: Ordered pizza and bread sticks online for pickup. Food was done quick, hot when I picked it up, and very delicious! Staff was polite and kind. Put part of my order in a bag to make it easier for me to carry. It was a small gesture, but made the experience even better!

name: Banine Cordex
text: In the event of my last delivery purchase, my food arrived 2 hours late. Several times before has my food incorrectly-made. Good food however; nice people.

name: trever mcloud
text: Great pizza and service the building is being remodeled so be aware

name: Karen Pastor
text: Owners are awesome.  All the workers are very helpful and polite.

name: Raymond Cobb
text: Amazing atmosphere and super personal service. The menu was crisp and delightful. Will surely recommend this spot to friends and family. Convenient prices and large portions. Great work.

name: Jack Koren
text: Got to spit on my own pizza

name: Troy Santana
text: I like this place! They offer marvelous meals, their menu is nice, The cook in that spot is an expert, I like a lot eating all their dishes. The food is always of high qualtity, the attitude towards the visitors  is efficient. I frequently visit this restaurant and I was never disappointed. Highly recommended.

name: crystal Hunkele
text: Great pizza low price

name: Fr. Michael Rush
text: We have ordered from the Allison Park store on several occasions. The food is excellent, and quite reasonably priced. The chocolate chip cookies are first-rate. We shall order from this store, again. Definitely recommend.

name: Angelina Thomas
text: My husband and I have been ordering pizza here at least twice a month since we moved to the area a year ago and always get delivery. Well, today, I tried to place our regular order and according to the girl on the phone, the new ownership ‚Ä¶More

text: Always friendly staff. The food is always fresh. Love this locarion!

text: Chicken spiniachi pizza was the best tonight! Every bites was perfect!
